pages.text: $(li)Flint is a sedimentary rock.$(br)$(li)It can be obtained when you break a block of Gravel or be found around the world.$(br)$(li)Fletchers, Leatherworkers, Toolsmiths, Weaponsmiths will exchange this item by Emeralds.

$(li)Flint can be used to craft multiple items:$(br)$(li)Stone Sword$(li)Stone Pickaxe$(li)Stone Axe$(li)Stone Shovel$(li)Stone Hoe$(li)Flint Picker$(li)Flint Block$(li)Fletcher$(li)Arrows$(li)Flint and Steel.
